name: Pinball - Unlock
description:
Pinball Strike Playground is a cute retro arcade game. Every level has unique features and very different gameplay. Will you be able to unlock all levels after passing each game table? We are absolutely sure that you will be rewarded for your quick reflexes with plenty of action.Make sure to try our Pinball Strike Playground where you are able to smash destructible bricks.Take care: some obstacles has anti-bonus and will decrease your points value.

Features

- Oldschool 2D Pinball
- Interactive gameplay with addictive features
- New standard for realistic ball physics
- New tables released regularly!
